desc: We build Totally Rad Products based on Toyota Tacoma and 4Runner platforms for the OffRoad community. Our focus is high quality design with an emphasis on simplistic functionality and durability. Our aim is to solve those pesky little “what if” problems.

layout.text: T.R.P. Offroad introduces The Bullet Cover

It all started with an idea to eliminate the height of the dorsal fin on the factory antenna...
Now we have something smoother, more refined and fully functional.
